original_text: Some of the priests and Levites lived on the land around the cities that belonged to them. So the king's officers chose honest men to take the gifts to them. They gave them their proper share of the gifts. The priests had to be Aaron's descendants, and the Levites' names had to be on the list of Levite families.
korean_text: 각 성읍에서 등록된 사람이 있어 성읍 가까운 들에 사는 아론 자손 제사장들에게도 나눠 주되 제사장들의 모든 남자와 족보에 기록된 레위 사람들에게 나눠 주었더라

sentences.original_text: Some of the priests and Levites lived on the land
sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 제사장들과 레위 사람들은 땅에 살았으며

sentences.original_text: around the cities that belonged to them
So the king's officers chose honest men
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 왕의 관원들이 정직한 사람들을 선택했고

sentences.original_text: to take the gifts to them
They gave them their proper share of the gifts
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그들에게 예물의 적절한 몫을 주었습니다

sentences.original_text: The priests had to be Aaron's descendants
and the Levites' names had to be on the list
sentences.korean_translation: 레위 사람들의 이름은 명단에 있어야 했습니다
